channel.title: Snippets on Marco Ribeiro
channel.description: Recent content in Snippets on Marco Ribeiro

item.title: Bash Script Snippets
item.description: Cut string # my_filename="interesting-text-file.txt" echo ${my_filename:0:21} echo ${my_filename%.*} complicated_filename="hello-world.tar.gz" echo ${complicated_filename%%.*} echo ${my_filename/.*/} sed 's/[.].*//' <<< 'hello-world.tar.gz' cut -f1 -d"." <<< 'hello-world.tar.gz' ~/execute_string.sh # your_command_string="..." output=$(eval "$your_command_string") echo "$output" ~/random.sh # echo $(( $RANDOM % 50 + 1 )) numero=${RANDOM:0:2} ~/return_values.
